name: BulletDuckingHell
description:
What is this Game? 

It might look pretty, but it is BulletDuckingHell in there. BulletDuckingHell is a 2D bullet hell where only the strong and quick-witted can survive. As a newly hatched chick, you're a quick and easy target for other animals looking to assert their dominance on the chain. Prove them wrong, fight for your life, and show them ducking hell!

How to Play: 

The objective is easy. Stay alive and earn the highest score possible. Traverse across two different arenas, each with a mechanic implemented to help assist you in your survival. Enemies you defeat grant points that count towards your score, but be careful! Defeat too much and you might find yourself running out of ammo! Scavenge ammo across the level and reap collectibles to take a prize. In there, it's you against the world! Do you like the odds?

Credits:

Designers: Andrew Harrell and Brenden Lewis

Artist: Ariel Sturgis

Programmers: Logan Downey and Rasul Palmer

Assets Used/Credits for Assets:

  • Tiny Worlds - Font
  • Alien Nude LTD - Basic sprites to use
  • Rizwan Ashraf- Music
  • Zero Rare- Sound Effects
